DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine whether physical activity ( exercise ) program community improve functional overall health status old woman history breast cancer . The physical activity exercise program design old breast cancer survivor , particular African-Americans woman low socio-economic status , least likely engage physical activity .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Intervention Reduce Functional Health Disparities Among Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aim # 1 : To determine effect refine culturally-sensitive physical activity intervention functional outcome 20 52 week among old Breast Cancer survivor within five year treatment completion stage I-III Breast Cancer ( BCa ) . Specific Aim # 2 : To examine whether race socioeconomic status ( SES ) moderate intervention effect physical activity ( PA ) level functional outcomes 20 52 week . Specific Aim # 3 : To examine effect PA intervention longitudinal change belief , attitude preference ( KAPs ) PA level , extent change factor mediate intervention effect functional outcome . Specific Aim # 4 : To determine effect PA intervention surrogate biomarkers associate breast cancer prognosis functional disability .
DOC.criteria: Pathologically confirm breast cancer Stage IIII Patients complete treatment within five year treatment completion ( primary surgery , chemotherapy radiation therapy ) , whichever receive last .
